headline.main: Escalation in Ship Attacks Pushes Yemen Towards Starvation
headline.print_headline: Escalation in Ship Attacks Pushes Yemen Towards Starvation

lead_paragraph: Cruise missiles, floating mines and a remote-controlled boat have been deployed to attack ships in Yemen in recent months, changing the dynamic of the two-year-old war and pushing the country closer to famine, shipping and aid officials say.
snippet: Cruise missiles, floating mines and a remote-controlled boat have been deployed to attack ships in Yemen in recent months, changing the dynamic of the two-year-old war and pushing the country closer to famine, shipping and aid officials say....
